sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEMODIA, in botany : A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of didynamia, and order of angio- ſpermia ; and in the natural ſyſtem ranging under the 40th order, Personatœ. The calyx is quinquepartite ; the corolla bilabiated ; there are four ſtamina ; each of the filaments are bifid, and have two antheræ. The capſule is bilocular. There is only one ſpecies, the maritima.
